Text:
I wish my first attempt looked as great as this one :)
Top notch work m8, 10/10 !!
Great rip.  Thank you.  I have replaced my old video cassette copy with this :)

Great film, and great quality.  I hadn't watched this since I was a kid.  I was sad and a little irritated to learn that the DVD does not have Belle's song though.  Cutting out that key part of the plot, and a key song that directly mirrors the closing song, is a pretty major let down, especially knowing it was just Disney nonsense.  Does anyone know where to find a version with the song included?
